---
title: stdout
---

Printing:

```{julia}
println(1)
```

```{julia}
println("string")
```

```{julia}
println(1)
println("string")
```

Logging:

```{julia}
@info "info text" value=1
```

```{julia}
@warn "warn text" value=2
```

```{julia}
@error "error text" value=3
```

```{julia}
struct Color
    text::String
end
Base.show(io::IO, c::Color) = printstyled(io, c.text; color = :red)
Color("red")
```

Warning suppression:

```{julia}
#| warning: false
@info "suppressed info"
@warn "suppressed warn"
@error "suppressed error"
```

```{julia}
@info "visible info"
@warn "visible warn"
@error "visible error"
```

```{julia}
#| warning: true
@info "explicit info"
@warn "explicit warn"
@error "explicit error"
```
